node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `likeitlog` ( `likeitlog_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `hits` int DEFAULT '0', `user_agent` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `liked_node_id` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`likeitlog_id`), UNIQUE KEY `user_agent__liked_node_id` (`user_agent`,`liked_node_id`), KEY `user_agent` (`user_agent`), KEY `liked_node_id` (`liked_node_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: likeitlog
